price: А они за које се испуни Реч твога Господара заиста неће никад поверовати,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
